name: CoReCo
tagline: Comparative ReConstruction of genome-scale metabolic networks
body:
CoReCo is a computational method for reconstructing metabolic networks of multiple species from protein sequence and phylogenetic data.

![CoReCo word cloud](http://www.cs.helsinki.fi/u/epitkane/coreco.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
